Package polyglot.ast

Interface ExprOps

All Known Subinterfaces:
CallOps, NewOps
All Known Implementing Classes:
AmbAssign_c, AmbExpr_c, ArrayAccess_c, ArrayAccessAssign_c, ArrayInit_c, Assign_c, Binary_c, BooleanLit_c, Call_c, Cast_c, CharLit_c, ClassLit_c, Conditional_c, EnumConstant_c, Expr_c, Field_c, FieldAssign_c, FloatLit_c, FunctionValue_c, Instanceof_c, IntLit_c, JL5AssignExt, JL5BinaryExt, JL5CallExt, JL5ClassLitExt, JL5ConditionalExt, JL5ExprExt, JL5FieldExt, JL5InstanceofExt, JL5NewArrayExt, JL5NewExt, JL5SpecialExt, JL5UnaryExt, JL7NewExt, JL8CallExt, Lit_c, Local_c, LocalAssign_c, New_c, NewArray_c, NullLit_c, NumLit_c, Special_c, StringLit_c, Unary_c
public interface ExprOps
This interface allows extensions both to override and reuse functionality in Term_c.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Object constantValue​(Lang lang)
    Return the constant value of the expression, if any.
    boolean constantValueSet​(Lang lang)
    Return true iff the compiler has determined whether this expression has a constant value.
    boolean isConstant​(Lang lang)
    Return whether the expression evaluates to a constant.

  • Method Details

    • constantValueSet

      boolean constantValueSet​(Lang lang)
      Return true iff the compiler has determined whether this expression has a constant value. The value returned by isConstant() is valid only if constantValueSet() is true.

    • isConstant

      boolean isConstant​(Lang lang)
      Return whether the expression evaluates to a constant. Requires that disambiguation has been done, and that constantValueSet() is true.

    • constantValue

      java.lang.Object constantValue​(Lang lang)
      Return the constant value of the expression, if any. Requires that isConstant() is true.
